attributes.action: David Cameron to resign after the referendum on a vote for Brexit!
attributes.background: Our current PM has been a poor Ambassador for Britain on the run up to the EU Referendum.  If anything he has damaged our reputation as a potential global player.  Because of this and his pro EU stance it would be inappropriate for him to be PM of an independent Britain.

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
